metadata.Plot: Princess Fjellrose has never been outside the safe mountain, until her father is sick and dying. Only humans down in the valley can save him. She goes on a dangerous journey, and put their world in danger, in spite of her good intentions.
metadata.Actors: Ane Viola Semb, Johan Tinus Lindgren, Finn Schau
